title: Trump signs landmark GENIUS Act, establishing first federal stablecoin regulatory framework
summary: President Trump signed the GENIUS Act (Guiding and Establishing National Innovation for US Stablecoins Act), creating the first federal regulatory system for stablecoins. The legislation requires 100% reserve backing and monthly public disclosures, simultaneously establishing a legal framework that benefits World Liberty Financial's USD1 stablecoin, a venture partially owned by the Trump family.
description: President Trump signed the GENIUS Act into law, establishing a legal category to further legitimize stablecoins and create new opportunities for World Liberty Financial's USD1 stablecoin, a venture that sends most of its profits to the Trump family.
